metadata.description: Consolidated event data for The Generator Student Calendar - Single source of truth

currentEvents.title: Babson Commons Mixer
currentEvents.description: The opening generator mixer aims to bring the larger student community together in a less formal manner with a focus on creating a welcoming and interactive atmosphere for students to connect. Postponed from August 30 due to rain. Join us for free Chick-fil-A, great music from our DJ, and enter the raffle for a chance to win Meta Ray Bans!
currentEvents.shortBlurb: Opening mixer with free Chick-fil-A, DJ, and Meta Ray Bans raffle
currentEvents.posterImageAlt: Horn Library Mixer - The Generator event with free food, live DJ, and giveaway

currentEvents.title: Org Fair
currentEvents.description: Babson's club and org fair for all students, with a focus on showing off the generator's capability and new updates.
currentEvents.shortBlurb: Showcase Generator's capabilities at Babson's org fair

currentEvents.title: GenAi tools for Marketing (with Babson Mkt Society)
currentEvents.description: Video has become the backbone of modern marketing—and with generative AI, creating high-quality, tailored content is more accessible than ever. In collaboration with BMS and AIC.

currentEvents.title: Generator Cafe
currentEvents.description: Join us for Generator Cafe, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

currentEvents.title: Foundations of AI (with AIClub)/Are you smarter than an AI?
currentEvents.description:
Large scale event where it is a edutainment style, both informative and game show like energy. Go over a quick intro of foundations of AI and then have a kahoot style quiz where people compete for prizes. CAB Bingo energy.

Contact Spencer, Gavin, Sabrina, Reece with any questions.
currentEvents.shortBlurb: Game show style AI education event

currentEvents.title: Elevating your business w/AI (Etower)
currentEvents.description: Join The Generator and E-Tower for an interactive workshop designed to transform your business through AI integration.

currentEvents.title: AI to Cheat (2truths + a lie)
currentEvents.description: Not all AI tools are created equal. Some drive productivity, some fuel creativity—and some cross the line. This event explores the ethical boundaries of AI use in academic and professional settings.

currentEvents.title: Roundtable: Claiming Your Value in the Era of AI - Future of Work Collab
currentEvents.description: Join us for a roundtable discussion on claiming your value in the era of AI.
currentEvents.shortBlurb: Discussion on value in AI era

currentEvents.title: AI Matchmaking Event (collab w/POW)
currentEvents.description: Looking to spark new connections at Babson? The Generator, in collaboration with POW, invites you to experience the future of networking through AI-powered matchmaking.

currentEvents.title: Vibe Coding Workshop
currentEvents.description: The AI Coding Tools Workshop, in collaboration with CODE, will be a student-led event focused on exploring AI-driven software development tools and building MVP products.
currentEvents.shortBlurb: Build MVPs with AI coding tools
currentEvents.posterImageAlt: Vibe Coding Workshop event poster - AI coding tools workshop with Popeyes

currentEvents.title: AI Olympics (mini Bthon: multiple clubs)
currentEvents.description: Step into the arena where creativity, competition, and technology collide. The Babson AI Olympics is a thrilling multi-club collaboration event.

currentEvents.title: Large Room VR Product Design comp (PB&J)
currentEvents.description: We show the community the text to image to 3D to VR workflow, input the 3D models into a shared VR space, and have participants compete in product design challenges.

currentEvents.title: Generator 3rd Annual Buildathon
currentEvents.description: Join us for an energizing one-day AI hackathon at the Weissman Foundry! In partnership with Microsoft Research, this event challenges students to build innovative AI solutions.

currentEvents.title: AI in Real Estate investing (with CRE & AIC)
currentEvents.description: Join The Generator, Babson Real Estate Club, and AI Club for a collaborative event exploring how artificial intelligence is transforming real estate investment strategies.

pastEvents.title: Generator AITTP Session 2
pastEvents.description: Full-day, interactive, hands-on AI learning experience for faculty to introduce key concepts in AI and machine learning, initiating cross-divisional conversations about the significance of AI to higher education, and highlighting both the opportunities and risks of using AI-tools in teaching, learning, and research through direct experimentation.
pastEvents.shortBlurb: Full-day AI learning experience for faculty

pastEvents.title: Generator Intro to AI Workshop
pastEvents.description: Kickoff event to provide foundational knowledge about AI. In partnership with AI Club.

pastEvents.title: AI Arts & Performance Gallery Opening
pastEvents.description: AI-artist show and discussion at the Hollister Gallery Heart to Heart? A Curious Human-Machine Dialogue featuring the AI-creations of Generator faculty Prof. Davit Khachatryan.

pastEvents.title: Generator AI Roundtable
pastEvents.description: AI guest speaker, roundtable discussion, and networking for AI enthusiasts.

pastEvents.title: Making Art with AI
pastEvents.description: BabsonARTS/Foundry/AI Club/Generator event exploring AI in creative applications.

pastEvents.title: AI Arts & Performance; AI Artist Exhibit and Discussion
pastEvents.description: AI-artist show and discussion at the Hollister Gallery Heart to Heart? A Curious Human-Machine Dialogue featuring the AI-creations of Generator faculty Prof. Davit Khachatryan.

pastEvents.title: Generator joins Microsoft's Global AI-Hackathon
pastEvents.description: Faculty and students affiliated with The Generator participate in Microsoft's Global AI-Hackathon (55,000+ employees and customers). The theme is 'accelerating entrepreneurship and innovation with AI.' Part of a relationship with Microsoft Research.

pastEvents.title: Generator Open House
pastEvents.description: An Open House for the 85+ Babson Faculty who participated in the AI Teaching Training Program

pastEvents.title: Metropolis Institute Foundation Dedication
pastEvents.description: 'Imagining Tomorrow: The Role of AI in Shaping Babson's Future.' Generator faculty Erik Noyes and Kristi Girdharry join Generator Fellow Tom Davenport to share a vision for AI at Babson.
pastEvents.location: C. Dean Metropoulos Institute for Entrepreneurship and Technology
pastEvents.speakerName: Erik Noyes, Kristi Girdharry, Tom Davenport

pastEvents.title: Generator Product Design Competition
pastEvents.description: AI-supported product design challenge, promoting AI design capabilities. In partnership with AI Club.

pastEvents.title: Generator 'Share & Build' AI-Teaching Workshop
pastEvents.description: AI-supported pedagogical innovation workshop series for Babson faculty; for AITTP 'alumni' and other Babson faculty.

pastEvents.title: Generator Student-Faculty Mixer
pastEvents.description: Come learn more about The Generator and how you can get involved! Generator faculty look forward to meeting you and talking about AI at the event. There will be an overview of The Generator's vision and organization, as well as upcoming, exciting programming and opportunities for you to get involved!

pastEvents.title: Generator AITTP Session 3
pastEvents.description: Full-day, interactive, hands-on AI learning experience for faculty to introduce key concepts in AI and machine learning, initiating cross-divisional conversations about the significance of AI to higher education, and highlighting both the opportunities and risks of using AI-tools in teaching, learning, and research through direct experimentation.

pastEvents.title: Generator Build a Business with AI
pastEvents.description: This student-run session explores ways to build a business by leveraging AI and explores AI-driven business ideas.

pastEvents.title: Generator AI & Machine Learning Speaker Series Kickoff
pastEvents.description: 'Practical AI: Looking Beyond the Buzzword' with guest speaker, Aryan Jain '17. First in a series of technical experts in the area of ML from the corporate sector invited to present to Babson community (in layman's terms) on the use of ML in their organizations.

pastEvents.title: Google AI Labs Game Development Workshop in collaboration with CODE
pastEvents.description: Game development workshop in collaboration with Google AI Labs and CODE.

pastEvents.title: Generator AI in Art & Fashion Workshop
pastEvents.description: Exploration of AI's potential in creative fields. Demonstrate AI applications in art and fashion. In partnership with AI Club.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Generative AI & Writing Symposium
pastEvents.description: A one-day symposium for Boston-area Writing Program leaders to come together to share ideas, strategies, concerns, etc. regarding teaching and supporting writing across the curriculum.

pastEvents.title: Generator AI Roundtable
pastEvents.description: Discussion roundtable for AI enthusiasts, including guest speaker.

pastEvents.title: Google AI Labs and AI Club: Explore Careers in AI
pastEvents.description: Career exploration event in collaboration with Google AI Labs and AI Club.

pastEvents.title: Generator AI & Machine Learning Speaker Series
pastEvents.description: 'The Future of Healthcare: How AI and Data Science are Revolutionizing Patient Care' with Lorie Wijintjes. Second in a series of technical experts in the area of ML from the corporate sector.

pastEvents.title: Global Consortium of Entrepreneurship Centers
pastEvents.description: Presentation on The Generator and AI @ Babson.

pastEvents.title: Microsoft-Generator AI and Entrepreneurship Buildathon
pastEvents.description: Main feature AI & Entrepreneurship Event! Large scale, 1-day AI-hackathon in the Weissman Foundry. Part of a growing relationship with Microsoft Research.

pastEvents.title: Generator Work Futures Lab Workshop
pastEvents.description: 'AI and Humans at Work - Who shapes whom?' The rapid development of AI, and Generative AI in particular, provides both enormous opportunities and raises difficult questions for human work.
pastEvents.shortBlurb: AI and future of work workshop

pastEvents.title: Generator AI Showcase Event and Roundtable meeting
pastEvents.description: This Showcase event is hosted by Babson's Generator AI Lab in collaboration with the AI Club, Product Building & Jamming, and Code. Participants will have the opportunity to win prizes such as Meta Ray Bans, Oculus 3, Mini Holo-Fan, and more!
pastEvents.prize: Meta Ray Bans, Oculus 3, Mini Holo-Fan

pastEvents.title: Generator Work Futures Lab Workshop
pastEvents.description: 'Flourishing in the Age of AI - Building a Creative & Collaborative Dynamic with GenAI'. In today's rapidly evolving landscape, AI is reshaping how corporate leaders and professionals approach creativity and collaboration.

pastEvents.title: Generator 'Share & Build' AI-Teaching Workshop
pastEvents.description: AI-supported pedagogical innovation workshop series for Babson faculty.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Spring Kickoff Roundtable: AI in 2025 & Beyond
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for our Spring 2025 kickoff Roundtable! Get an inside look at our organization as we share highlights from last semester and unveil exciting new initiatives. Following our community updates, we'll dive into an engaging discussion exploring the current AI landscape.

pastEvents.title: AI and Storytelling
pastEvents.description: Storytelling is one of humanity's oldest and most powerful art forms, and collaboratively developing stories is a meaningful way to build connections and strengthen our sense of community. But what happens when ancient traditions meet cutting-edge technologies?

pastEvents.title: The Generator AI Coding Tools Workshop
pastEvents.description: The AI Coding Tools Workshop, in collaboration with CODE, will be a student-led event focused on exploring AI-driven software developments in tools, specifically highlighting platforms such as Cursor, v0, Replit Agent, Windsurf, Lovable, and many more.

pastEvents.title: The Generator AI-Open House
pastEvents.description: An informal community-building event for faculty, staff, and students who want to talk about AI. While the event is primarily social, The Generator team will give a brief preview of its Spring programming and share questions for group discussion.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day
pastEvents.description: Join the Generator Student Leadership Team for Builder's Day, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

pastEvents.title: The Generator AI Roundtable: Navigating the Ethics of AI
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for our Roundtable discussion! Engage in thought-provoking conversations about the latest developments in AI, from groundbreaking innovations to ethical challenges.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Leadership & Labs Monthly Meeting
pastEvents.description: Join us for The Generator's monthly community gathering where our lab teams and leadership come together to share and celebrate our latest achievements! Each lab will present their exciting ongoing projects in a casual, dinner-style setting.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for Builder's Day, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

pastEvents.title: The Generator B.R.A.I.N. Talk
pastEvents.description: The Generator will be hosting bi-monthly Generator B.R.A.I.N. Talks to facilitate conversation and engagement among the members of the Generator community. Bring your ideas and questions to discuss and network with fellow AI enthusiasts at these 1-hour, online meetings.

pastEvents.title: The Generator AI Writing Workshop
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team and students from the Babson Writing Center for an interactive workshop on mastering AI-assisted writing. Building on insights from the 'Writing with Robots' course and Writing Center expertise.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for Builder's Day, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

pastEvents.title: The Generator AI in Music Creation (w/Babson Sound)
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team and Babson Sound for an immersive exploration of AI's revolutionary impact on music creation. Experience hands-on demonstrations of cutting edge AI music platforms.

pastEvents.title: Generator's AI Arts & Performance hosts, An Evening with Catie Cuan, Robot Choreographer
pastEvents.description: Join Babson College alumni, students, and AI enthusiasts for an evening with entrepreneur, engineer, and artist, Dr. Catie Cuan is a pioneer in the nascent field or choreorobotics and works at the intersection of artificial intelligence, human-robot interaction, and art.

pastEvents.title: Generator AI & Machine Learning Speaker Series
pastEvents.description: 'AI - A Guide for Entrepreneurs' with David Foster. Third in a series of technical experts in the area of ML from the corporate sector. David Foster is a UK leader in Generative AI and co-founder of Applied Data Science Partners (ADSP).

pastEvents.title: The Generator Student-Faculty Mixer
pastEvents.description: Connect with The Generator's innovative lab faculty and discover exciting opportunities to get involved! This casual networking event brings together current and prospective students with faculty leads from our various labs.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for Builder's Day, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

pastEvents.title: The Generator Women in AI Day
pastEvents.description: Organized by The Generator Student Leadership Team, this informal gathering will feature guest speaker Iman Oubou, focused on women in the AI industry. Designed to create mentorship opportunities and professional connections among women in AI.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for Builder's Day, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for Builder's Day, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

pastEvents.title: Elevate Your Business with AI
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team and E-Tower for an interactive workshop designed to transform your business through AI integration. Learn practical strategies to leverage AI tools across your business operations.

pastEvents.title: Generator Arts & AI Symposium
pastEvents.description: State of the Arts and AI—a symposium of arts leaders in the greater Boston area to discuss and demonstrate/perform/exhibit examples of AI-infused arts practices.

pastEvents.title: Microsoft-Generator AI and Entrepreneurship 2nd Buildathon
pastEvents.description: Join us for an energizing one-day AI hackathon at The Weissman Foundry! In partnership with Microsoft Research, this event challenges Babson, Olin, and Wellesley students to build innovative AI solutions.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for Builder's Day, a weekly collaborative workspace where student builders, tech enthusiasts, and aspiring entrepreneurs come together to create, share, and innovate!

pastEvents.title: Generator B.R.A.I.N. Talk
pastEvents.description: The Generator will also host a virtual meetup. Generator B.R.A.I.N. Talks facilitate conversation and engagement among members of the Generator community. Bring your ideas and questions to discuss, and network with fellow AI enthusiasts in these 1-hour, online, bi-monthly meetings.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Leadership & Labs Monthly Meeting
pastEvents.description: Join us for The Generator's monthly community gathering where our lab teams and leadership come together to share and celebrate our latest achievements! Each lab will present their exciting ongoing projects in a casual, dinner-style setting.

pastEvents.title: Microsoft-Generator AI and Entrepreneurship 2nd Buildathon
pastEvents.description: Join us for an energizing one-day AI hackathon at The Weissman Foundry! In partnership with Microsoft Research, this event challenges Babson, Olin, and Wellesley students to build innovative AI solutions.

pastEvents.title: Generator AI & Machine Learning Speaker Series
pastEvents.description: 'Encoder-Only Transformers, the Unsung Hero of the AI Revolution' with Josh Starmer. Fourth in a series of technical experts. Josh is renowned for his exceptional, engaging style in simplifying complex concepts in data science, machine learning, and statistics.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Product Design Event - Accelerating Idea to Product
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team and experience the future of design at our Product Design Event in the Weissman Foundry. This hands-on event invites creators and thinkers to explore and learn applicable generative AI tools.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Builder's Day Demo Day
pastEvents.description: Join The Generator Student Leadership Team for this culminating event where students who participated in Builder's Day throughout the semester will showcase their tech and AI projects to fellow builders and the Babson community.

pastEvents.title: Generator Generative AI & Future of Work and Industries Symposium
pastEvents.description: A ½ day symposium/workshop exploring the effects of Gen AI on jobs across a variety of industries. The goal would be to first, have experts present a couple of real-life examples how work has changed with the introduction of Gen AI.

pastEvents.title: The Generator Student-Faculty Mixer
pastEvents.description: Connect with The Generator's innovative lab faculty and discover exciting opportunities to get involved! This casual networking event brings together current and prospective students with faculty leads from our various labs.

pastEvents.title: Republic 2.0 (Future City)
pastEvents.description: In a rising age of holograms, virtual realities, AI revolutions, and metaverses, how might we imagine a city of the future? 70 Babson students will present a fascinating series of images, videos, and creative simulations in a spectacle of world-building like no other.

pastEvents.title: Work Futures Lab Symposium: People and Technology @ Work: Is Gen AI Different?
pastEvents.description: A symposium & workshop exploring the effects of Gen AI on work across a variety of industries. Learn from academic experts who study the mechanisms though which Gen AI affects how we work.
